g.text: Hash and convert password to EC point
Apply the PRF on the hudden point
encMsg1 = aesEnc_PRISMKey1( "Congrats! Your prize is xxxxxxxx" )
encMsg2 = aesEnc_PRISMKey2( "This is an example message" )
Hash and convert password to EC point
Test if IP needs to be throttled
Apply the PRF on the hudden point
if server exposed, send secret PRISM
if info != null then Display( info )
